CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:09): Back. I did a little more than have lunch. I efficiency modded and installed an air conditioner.  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:10): What I wanted to say about ui-tests was I don't like TestUtils very much.  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 21:10  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:13): TestUtils is full of static (global) functions and variables. I think it would be better if the functions were split between AbstractTest and BasePage.  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 21:14  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:17): I would like to create a singleton object which holds all of the variables. A single static reference in the AbstractTest class can hold this object.

vmassol - (21:20): or pseudo code  
vmassol - (21:20): I always find it easier to visualise on an example  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:20): quick example: getURLForPage(String space, String page, String action)  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:20): that's not a global function but should be a function for a page object.

CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:21): page.isNew()  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:22): Have fun watching tennis, we can talk about this tomorrow.  
vmassol - (21:22): sounds good in general  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (21:23): I'll start on it, so we'll have something to talk about.
